text: jab shaitaan[1] ne unake lie unake kukarmon ko shobhaneey bana diya tha aur us (shaitaan) ne kahaah aaj tumapar koee prabhutv nahin pa sakata aur main tumhaara sahaayak hoon. phir jab donon senaayen sammukh ho gaeen, to apanee ediyon ke bal phir gaya aur kah diya ki main tumase alag hoon. main jo dekh raha hoon, tum nahin dekhate. vaastav mein, main allaah se dar raha hoon aur allaah kadee yaatana dene vaala hai
